question:
Which of the following is / are correct statements with respect to Inter-Bank Mobile Payment Service (IMPS)? 
  1. It is operated by National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) 
  2. It facilitates customers to use mobile channels for inter bank funds transfer
  Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Inter–Bank Mobile Payment Service is operated by National Payments Corporation of India. It provides an instant 24* 7 interbank electronic fund transfer service through use of mobile channels.
